fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Where am I?** - At night, go to a player's house. Attacks against you will fail,  but if the player you visit is attacked, you are attacked too.
- **Who are you?** - Learn a player's role. If they are evil or neutral, they learn your role too.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Who am I?** - Gain a random ability from the first person who dies. This is disabled if you are part of the Daily Streak Faction.
- **I know who I am.** - If you are part of the Daily Streak Faction, each day choose an ability to get from a player who died last night.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: **I just want to go home...** - Survive to the end of the game. If you are part of the Daily Streak Faction, and the Daily Streak Faction loses but you are alive, you still win.
